title: Reliable Friends!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Hmmm...... What the heck should I do......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>What’s wrong, Setsuna-san? It’s rare for you to look this troubled, Setsuna-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ah, Shioriko-san. .......Wait, yeah, Shioriko-san......!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Shioriko-san, would you be interested in becoming a commander?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Huh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I was thinking of forming a school idol superhero organization, and every superhero needs a commander. Shioriko-san, you’d be perfect as a commander! Do you think you can do it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I don’t really get what you’re talking about. Is it something like a play......? Then, okay. I’d be happy to do that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Hooray!! Thank you so much!! The problem has been totally solved!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Fufu, that’s great to hear. Later on, please teach me how to act like a commander.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
